CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Audio response strength (X: bass level, Y: bass hits)
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_mix

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Audio response curve (higher = more intense reaction)
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_pow

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Bass threshold range (X: minimum level, Y: maximum level)
CONTROLS.NAME: bass_limit

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Bass rotation intensity (how much bass hits spin the fractal)
CONTROLS.NAME: rotation_level_0

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Bass rotation decay rate (how quickly rotation fades after hits)
CONTROLS.NAME: rotation_falloff_0

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Bass rotation speed (X: base speed, Y: boost on hits)
CONTROLS.NAME: rotation_speed_0

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Mid rotation intensity (how much mids spin the fractal)
CONTROLS.NAME: rotation_level_1

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Mid rotation decay rate (rotation fade speed for mids)
CONTROLS.NAME: rotation_falloff_1

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Mid rotation speed (X: base speed, Y: boost on hits)
CONTROLS.NAME: rotation_speed_1

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: High rotation intensity (how much highs spin the fractal)
CONTROLS.NAME: rotation_level_2

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: High rotation decay rate (rotation fade speed for highs)
CONTROLS.NAME: rotation_falloff_2

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: High rotation speed (X: base speed, Y: boost on hits)
CONTROLS.NAME: rotation_speed_2

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Fractal geometry (X: depth offset, Y: Z-axis stretch)
CONTROLS.NAME: shape_xy

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: RGB color of flash effect on bass hits
CONTROLS.NAME: flash_col

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Flash brightness (X: off-beat, Y: on-beat intensity)
CONTROLS.NAME: flash_xy

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Overall brightness divider (lower = brighter output)
CONTROLS.NAME: global_div

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Base color oscillation (X and Y frequency components)
CONTROLS.NAME: base_xy

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Base color oscillation (Z and W frequency components)
CONTROLS.NAME: base_zw

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Color modulation (X: saturation multiplier, Y: phase offset)
CONTROLS.NAME: base_mod

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Feedback blend amount (X: off-beat, Y: on-beat trails)
CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_strength

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Feedback scaling (X: off-beat zoom, Y: on-beat zoom)
CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_zoom

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Feedback rotation (X: off-beat spin, Y: on-beat spin)
CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_rot

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: RGB tint for feedback trails during off-beat moments
CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_min

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: RGB tint for feedback trails during on-beat moments
CONTROLS.NAME: feedback_max

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Media opacity – fade visuals in or out
CONTROLS.NAME: media_opacity

CONTROLS.DESCRIPTION: Media multiplier – boost opacity for bold color effects
CONTROLS.NAME: media_multiplier

DESCRIPTION: Journey into the heart of a swirling Kali fractal galaxy where mathematics becomes cosmic art. This audio-reactive visualization features an intense, glowing core surrounded by spiraling clouds of blue ice and golden fire. The fractal morphs and rotates in response to bass, mids, and highs, creating a living nebula that pulses with every beat. Feedback trails leave ghostly echoes that zoom and spin, building layers of cosmic complexity. Perfect for deep electronic music and ambient sets, this shader transforms sound into an ever-evolving stellar phenomenon.
TITLE: Kali galaxy
